channel.title: New clan chat update!
channel.description: I personally enjoy the clan chat update. I want your opinions.

item.title: New clan chat update!
item.dc:creator: @Kulkka Kulkka
item.description:
@Kulkka wrote:

[quote=“dragonus18, post:6, topic:134575”]only 2 but i mena kool prayer ones like the ones i suggested ones that prayer pures can use like me

I.E.

Reversal
Reverses the next attack on you to your opponet and any status changes it would make
takes away rest of prayer points as soon as it is used
lvl 65 prayer req[/quote]
You attack somebody with low hp and then he fucking kills himself…Thats the gayest thing I have ever heard.

Read full topic

item.title: New clan chat update!
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

[quote=“dragonus18, post:6, topic:134575”]only 2 but i mena kool prayer ones like the ones i suggested ones that prayer pures can use like me

I.E.

Reversal
Reverses the next attack on you to your opponet and any status changes it would make
takes away rest of prayer points as soon as it is used
lvl 65 prayer req[/quote]

That sounds like pokemon or yugioh or something.

Not something we want in runescape.

Read full topic

item.title: New clan chat update!

item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

[quote=“dragonus18, post:6, topic:134575”]only 2 but i mena kool prayer ones like the ones i suggested ones that prayer pures can use like me

I.E.

Reversal
Reverses the next attack on you to your opponet and any status changes it would make
takes away rest of prayer points as soon as it is used
lvl 65 prayer req[/quote]Lol, and when a pure with 99 str attacks you he does a 30-30 with dds he gets hit instead of you? THAT’S FUCKING GAY.
